mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND IS_DEL = '0' ORDER BY SEQ_NO

FROM FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND IS_DEL = '0' AND CONFIG_ABLE=1 ORDER BY SEQ_NO
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE(PERFORMANCE_NAME,COMP_ID,SEQ_NO,CREATE_TIME,IS_DEL,CAN_DEL,PERFORMANCE_PROPORTION,IS_AUTO,EN_MSG,COLLECTION_TYPE,COMMISSION_TYPE,ALIAS,EDIT_EXT_ABLE,CAN_DELETE,CAN_ADD,CONFIG_ABLE) select PERFORMANCE_NAME,${compId},SEQ_NO,CREATE_TIME,IS_DEL,CAN_DEL,PERFORMANCE_PROPORTION,IS_AUTO,EN_MSG,COLLECTION_TYPE,COMMISSION_TYPE,ALIAS,EDIT_EXT_ABLE,CAN_DELETE,CAN_ADD,CONFIG_ABLE from FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE where COMP_ID=0

mapper.insert: insert into FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE(PERFORMANCE_NAME,COMP_ID,SEQ_NO,CREATE_TIME,IS_DEL,CAN_DEL,PERFORMANCE_PROPORTION,IS_AUTO,EN_MSG,COLLECTION_TYPE,COMMISSION_TYPE,ALIAS,CAN_DELETE,CAN_ADD,CONFIG_ABLE) select PERFORMANCE_NAME,${compId},SEQ_NO,CREATE_TIME,IS_DEL,CAN_DEL,PERFORMANCE_PROPORTION,IS_AUTO,EN_MSG,COLLECTION_TYPE,COMMISSION_TYPE,ALIAS,CAN_DELETE,CAN_ADD,CONFIG_ABLE from FUN_PERFORMANCE_TYPE where COMP_ID=0 AND IS_DEL = 0 and COLLECTION_TYPE!=2
